page.title: 10ARTS AND CRAFTS IN GLENLIVET
page.content: There are several people in the area who are skilled in such crafts as painting, pottery, soft toy making and modelling. Many of the women are also skilled knitters but just for the family. Most of the crafts are hobbies although some articles like the models of birds and animals are sold in the hotels to tourists. Some paintings have been exhibited locally and are offered for sale. Many articles made by the members of the Women's Rural Institute are exhibited each year at the local agricultural shows at Keith and Grantown.
